name: RCZ - Typing
description:
WARNING - DO NOT PRESS CAPS LOCK WHILE TYPING AS THE WORDS LOOK CAPITAL BUT THEY ARE NORMAL.

Support it on - Patreon - RCZ

So I have tried of making a schedule of posting games on 7th or 24th of a month. Which means I am trying to publish at least one game in a month. 

But this might have a gap as I would have my exams in between, but from my side I would try my best. So now it depends on your support to me.

So that was all about the schedule lets talk about the game.

As the name suggests it is a typing game simple but sometimes may be difficult as well but I would try to upload a updated file on the same page of the page with better work. You all can also tell me the ways to improve the game as being an indie (independent) game developer and thinking of the ideas and then making everything by my own is a lot difficult. So your help would help in making it better.

A few advantages in the timer scene :- 

1- You can't die if you leave any work but in the practice scene you can die.

Disadvantage in timer scene

1- The words come faster then the practice scene.
